name: Switch (blueapollo)
description:
Switch is a simple platformer where you step on a switch to open a door, whilst avoiding spikes and falling. 

Controls:

A and D - Left and Right directions

Space - Jump

___

For now, it only have five levels. I may add some more, depending if I want to expand it or move on to a next project.

This is the first game that I've ever done in Godot, without prior knowledge of scripting. I want to upload it to know your opinions and suggestions, to know how I can make my next game better.  So please comment down below, I will truly appreciate it. 

All coding, art, and music and sfx are all done by Blueapollo_

___

You could also buy me a ko-fi here. Thanks!
